## JSONSerializer.serialize() method

Serializes an object to a JSON string.

**Signature:**

```typescript
serialize(object: any): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | any | The object to serialize. |

**Returns:**

string

The serialized JSON string.
